Darin Erstad moved from center to first base. Scott Spiezio, who had been playing first, positioned himself between first and second and was listed as the second baseman.  Adam Kennedy, who had been at second base, stayed in the infield between Spiezio and shortstop Jose Nieves.  Kennedy was listed as center fielder.

$Perry dove and gloved the ball, falling on the bag for the putout; he jumped up and spun to throw home attempting to get Hunter; Koskie, who was about 25 feet from Perry, was hit on the chest; he was on the ground over 5 minutes and sat up as he was taken off the field

ej,hawkl001,P,tscht901,Arguing position of bullpen chair $LaTroy Hawkins ejected by 2B umpire Tim Tschida in 3rd for refusing to move his chair in bullpen; was restrained by teammates and escorted from field
$Martinez' popup hit one of the speakers hanging from the ceiling and bounced in between the girders like a pinball before it fell near the plate
$Sierra had minor strain of his quadriceps

$Rivas tried for triple, but Pierzynski had stopped at 3B and Rivas saw his liner clear Cameron's head but did not see Pierzynski at 3B; he stopped half way to 3B and tried to get back but was tagged out by Bret Boone on a great play (Boone had taken the throw well into the outfield and ran to 2B to make a diving tag)
Debut game for Jose Flores
Debut game for Eric Eckenstahler
Debut game for Shane Loux
$Rivera's bat flew down the 3B line and rolled almost to the bullpen; Pena wound up 10 feet toward 2B attempting to dance out of the way of the bat and was almost thrown out by Pierzynski
